Class Bucket

    • dbdiffchecker.Database

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Bucket
extends Database
    Models a Couchbase bucket by keeping track of all indices and documents.

    5-24-19

      Bucket(DbConn conn)
      Creates a database that models the Couchbase bucket using the Couchbase connection in orde to get a list of documents, idndices, and other pertinent information.
